-6994334737562908582.name: Mumbai Vertical Farms Initiative
-6994334737562908582.description: Innovative vertical farming project in Mumbai converting unused urban spaces into sustainable farms. Features include solar-powered LED lighting, automated hydroponics, and IoT monitoring. Will create 50 local jobs and provide fresh produce while using 95% less water than traditional farming.
-6994334737562908582.sustainability_impact: Project reduces water usage by 95%, eliminates pesticides, and cuts carbon emissions by 70%. Creates 50 green jobs and improves urban food security. Uses 100% renewable energy and implements zero-waste practices through organic waste recycling.
